name: Ralston_Bonded_Leather_Reclining_Loveseat
reviews: I have had my couches for a few weeks now and they are very nice. The only reason I didn't give them a 5 star rating is because the backs of the chair have to be assembled by sliding them into metal bars. My only worry is they don't line up evenly in the back of the couch which makes me worry on the longevity of the couch.
description: Bring opulence and comfort to your living room with this loveseat from our Ralston Collection. With dual reclining ends on the loveseat this collection was made with your superb comfort in mind. Soft clean lines and edges add a stunning contemporary flair, offered in black or grey makes this loveseat perfect for your personal styling.
